solution_line_template: First find the number of stairs the players climb up and down each time: {stairs_one_way} stairs * {up_and_down} = <<{stairs_one_way}*{up_and_down}={stairs_per_run}>>{stairs_per_run} stairs

Then multiply the number of stairs per run by the number of runs to find the total number of stairs the players climb: {stairs_per_run} stairs/run * {num_runs} runs = <<{stairs_per_run}*{num_runs}={total_stairs}>>{total_stairs} stairs

Then multiply the number of stairs by the number of calories each stair burns: {total_stairs} stairs * {calories_per_stair} calories/stair = <<{total_stairs}*{calories_per_stair}={total_calories}>>{total_calories} calories
